member.summary: Class which represents an IntelliSense completion item.

member.summary: Gets or sets the label value, i.e. display text to users.

member.summary: Gets or sets the documentation comment.

member.summary: Gets or sets the custom sort text.

member.summary: Gets or sets the insert text.

member.summary: Gets or sets the insert text format.

member.summary: Gets or sets the text edit.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServer.Protocol.CompletionItem.AdditionalTextEdits
member.summary: Gets or sets any additional text edits.
member.remarks: Additional text edits must not interfere with the main text edit.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServer.Protocol.CompletionItem.Command
member.summary: Gets or sets any optional command that will be executed after completion item insertion.
member.remarks: This feature is not supported in VS.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServer.Protocol.CompletionItem.Data
member.summary: Gets or sets any additional data that links the unresolve completion item and the resolved completion item.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServer.Protocol.Position.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Overrides base class method . Two positions are equal if their line and character are the same.
member.returns: True if the given position has the same line and character; false otherwise.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServer.Protocol.Position.GetHashCode
member.summary: Overrides base class method

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServer.Protocol.Position.op_Equality(Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServer.Protocol.Position,Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServer.Protocol.Position)
member.summary: Overrides default equals operator. Two positions are equal if they are both null or one of them is the object equivalent of the other.
member.returns: True if both positions are null or one of them is the object equivalent of the other, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServer.Protocol.Position.op_Inequality(Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServer.Protocol.Position,Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServer.Protocol.Position)
member.summary: Overrides the default not equals operator.
member.returns: True if first and second positions are not equivalent.

member.summary: Documents are synced by always sending the full text.

member.summary: Documents are synced by sending only incremental updates.
